English:
Ah, here you are. I've been waiting.
I'll take care of that big thing first.
Chinese:
哦，你來了……我等你很久了。
趕快解決那個龐然大物吧。
Korean:
오, 왔나… 기다리고 있었어
빨리 저 커다란 놈을 정리하자고
German:
Ah, da bist du ja. Ich habe auf dich gewartet.
Ich kümmere mich erst um das Riesending da.

English:
Yes, Suedou told me all about it.
You softened up Examon, right?
Chinese:
啊，這麼說來，我從末堂那邊聽說了……
你讓艾克薩獸變弱了吧？
Korean:
아아, 그러고 보니 스에도에게서 들었어…
댁이 엑자몬을 약하게 만들었다며?
German:
Ja, Suedou hat mir alles erzählt.
Ihr habt Examon den Saft abgedreht, ja?

English:
Way to go, Cyber Sleuth...
Yeah?
Chinese: 很厲害嘛，電腦偵探……嗯？
Korean: 꽤 하잖아, 전뇌탐정…― 응?
German:
Tolle Sache, Cyber-Detektiv ...
Ist doch so?

English:
Ah, okay. This one?
This is the one you're worried about?
Chinese:
啊……這個東西嗎？
你很在意這個東西？
Korean:
아아… 이거 말이야?
이게 신경 쓰여?
German:
Ah, verstehe. Das hier?
Das macht dir Sorgen?

English:
It's pretty convenient, being able to devour
anything.
Chinese: 這傢伙挺方便的……什麼都吃。
Korean: 꽤 편리하다고, 이거… 무엇이든 먹을 수 있거든
German:
Alles einfach auffressen zu können ist ziemlich
praktisch.

English: Eaters, Digimon... even human beings, really.
Chinese:
不管是侵食者，還是數碼寶貝……
說不定，連人類也吃。
Korean:
이터든, 디지몬이든
…어쩌면, 인간이든
German: Verschlinger, Digimon ... auch Menschen.

English:
I just... I want to eat and eat and eat and I
can't stop.
Chinese: 我啊……就是想一直吃、一直吃、吃個不停。
Korean: 나 말이야… 어쨌든, 닥치는 대로 먹어 치우고 싶어
German:
Ich will fressen und fressen und fressen und kann
nicht aufhören.

English: I can't help it. It's like I'm always starving...
Chinese: 因為肚子實在是好餓好餓啊……
Korean: 배고파서 배고파서 어쩔 수가, 없거든…
German:
Ich kann nichts dagegen tun.
Ich bin ständig am Verhungern ...

English:
The more I eat, the more power I gain.
But at the same time, I'm able to feel less and
less.
Chinese:
因為吃得越多，就會得到越多力量。
慢慢地，內心會什麼都感受不到。
Korean:
먹으면 먹은 만큼, 힘이 손에 들어와
그러면서, 마음은 아무것도 느끼지 않게 되어 가
German:
Je mehr ich fresse, desto mächtiger werde ich.
Gleichzeitig spüre ich aber immer weniger ...

English:
The strange thing is that it's not as bad as I
might've thought. For whatever that's worth.
Chinese:
不可思議的是，這樣子……意外地也沒什麼不好……
真意外啊……
Korean:
이상하게도, 이게… 의외로 나쁘지 않아…
의외로 말이야…
German:
Seltsamerweise ist es aber gar nicht so schlimm,
wie ich erwartet hätte. Was auch immer mir das
bringt.

English:
Does that repulse you?
I suppose it would have to.
Chinese:
會覺得我很怪嗎？有很怪嗎？
哎，那是理所當然的吧？
Korean:
기분 나빠? 기분 나쁜 거야?
…뭐, 그야 그렇겠지?
German:
Findest du das widerwärtig?
Das musst du wohl zwangsläufig.

English: Ha... haha, hahahaha!
Chinese: 哈……哈哈、哈哈哈哈哈！
Korean: 하… 하핫, 하하하하핫!
German: Ha... haha, hahahaha!

English:
Hahaha, haha...
What's that? What's the point of getting this
powerful?
Chinese:
哈哈哈、哈哈……
什麼？你問我「變強要幹嘛」？
Korean:
하하하, 하하…
…하?「강해져서 어쩌려고」―라고?
German:
Hahahaha ...
Wie? Was ich mit dieser ganzen Macht vorhabe?

English: It's not like I want to do something terrible.
Chinese: 哎，我沒有想做什麼大事啦。
Korean: 뭐, 딱히 큰일을 저지르려는 건 아니야
German: Ich habe ganz bestimmt nichts Schlimmes vor.

English:
There was something I had forgotten to do for so
long. And I finally remembered what it was.
Chinese:
我一直有件還沒做完的事情……
我終於想起來了……
Korean:
나, 줄곧 하다가 남겨 둔 일이 있었어…
그걸, 드디어 기억해냈거든…
German:
Es gibt etwas, was ich so lange vergessen habe.
Endlich erinnere ich mich wieder.

English:
So I'm going to finish it.
And to do that, I need power...
Chinese:
所以我要做個了斷。
為此，我需要力量……
Korean:
그러니까, 그 일을 끝내겠어
그러기 위해서는 힘이 필요해…
German:
Also werde ich es zu Ende bringen.
Und dafür brauche ich Macht ...

English:
More, more, more...
More, more, more, more and more!
Chinese:
更多、更多、更多——
更多、更多、更多更多、更多的力量……！
Korean:
좀 더, 좀 더, 좀 더―
좀 더, 좀 더, 좀 더, 좀더좀더, 좀 더…!
German:
Mehr und mehr ...
Mehr und mehr und mehr und mehr!

English:
It's because I remembered! I have nowhere to hide.
And all my escape routes are cut off!
Chinese:
因為我已經想起來了呀……！
已經逃不掉了……無路可逃了！
Korean:
왜냐면, 나, 기억해내버렸으니까 말이야…!
더 이상 도망칠 수 없어… 도망칠 길은 어디에도 없다고…!
German:
Weil ich mich wieder erinnere! Ich kann mich nicht
mehr verstecken und es gibt kein Entrinnen!

English:
So I'm moving forward. No matter what happens,
I won't try to run or hide anymore!
Chinese:
所以，我要向前進……
不管發生什麼事，我都不會再逃避了！
Korean:
그러니까, 앞으로 나아가겠어…
무슨 일이 있어도, 난 더 이상, 도망치지 않겠어…!
German:
Es muss also vorwärts gehen. Was auch passiert,
ich werde nicht mehr weglaufen oder mich
verstecken!

English: But who cares about all of that?
Chinese: 哎……那種事情無所謂啦。
Korean: ……그보다, 그런 건 아무래도 좋잖아, 어떻든 간에
German: Aber wen interessiert das schon?

English:
You're right. Let's just leave that for now.
The real matter at hand is this huge thing.
Chinese:
是啊……已經無所謂了……
現在該做的事情是……收拾這個龐然大物啊。
Korean:
그래… 아무래도 좋다고, 이제…
………지금 해야 할 일은… 이 커다란 놈의 처리다
German:
Du hast recht. Vergessen wir das vorerst.
Wichtig ist jetzt dieses Riesendings.

English: Okay... I'm going to start.
Chinese: 好了……開打吧。
Korean: 자… 시작하자고
German: Also ... ich fange an.

English: It'd be messy if your buds started showing up.
Chinese: 如果你的伙伴陸續趕來，事情會很棘手啊。
Korean: …댁의 동료가 줄줄이 와 버리면, 성가시니까 말이야
German: Es wäre unschön, wenn deine Freunde aufkreuzen.
